btw on feature freeze, i believe it could be wise to start to think to introduce âsubsystem-dependentâ timeline, e.g for mempool it could be far earlier than the project-global feature freeze. that avoids last minute merge as some senior reviewers (apparently showing some sign of âprocess fatigue") justified recently the merge of #28948 (a controversial change, where itâs not even sure itâs solving well the pinning issue for L2s). idea is not new, makes that grief originally in 2021 in the context of tx-relay workshops (cf. [2nd irc meetings notes](https://github.com/ariard/L2-zoology/blob/master/discussions/l2-support-philosophy.md)).
